text:
@Bug12June @ChrisBEsq @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Are you high?

I already mentioned that Fauci, the darling of the left, was even saying at the time that it wasn't a threat here. As for the antibiotics, are you aware that the combination of hydroxychloroquine, zinc and azithromycin has  been extremely effective in treating it?
